Text: subtitles ? anyone ? portuguese preferred, but at least in english will do!
Aye, subtitles would be grand. Looked all over and haven't managed to find any.

Finally found subs for this. You just need to rename the text files to match the video files. Sub quality is decent, better than learning to speak French.
